q: confirmed details of Simon Cowell 's X Factor M onday morning. The big prize will be a$ 5 million Sony Music record deal. Contestants as young as 12 can compete. I like the idea that a 12-year-old on this show can compete with an older singer and a singing group, said Simon Cowell in a statement. "I've never believed there should be a cut-off age for talent, and we are going to put our money where our mouths are with the$ 5 million recording contract.

That really reflects the push Microsoft is making into the cloud, Steve Ballmer said during an online launch event on Thursday. Microsoft's not the only one gunning for the cloud.
